overview: Husayn relies on his own mother and sister for his taxi. The rich girl bumps into Nafin with her car and smashes his car. He leads him to the company department after he attacks her. Her father's salary reaches the blessings of a great businessman with power and influence. Hussein revolts and refuses to compensate for his loss. The mother suffers a health crisis and Hussein needs money to treat her and tries to get him from a salary but he refuses. The mother dies and the Hussein revolution grows. Niven is kidnapped and demands a big salary. He refuses to surrender and defies Hussein. The police arrive at the place with a salary. Hussein collapses before setting his position and being shot by police to be killed.
title: المخطوفه
